stops.name: Orlando West Rank
stops.description: Main taxi rank near Orlando Stadium. Busy; wait near central shelter.
stops.recommended_wait_spot: Under the large shelter by the rank
stops.hand_signal: Arm out, palm down, move hand left-to-right once

stops.name: Jabulani Corner
stops.description: Corner next to the market. Drivers slow down here.
stops.hand_signal: Arm raised above shoulder, palm facing forwards

stops.name: Johannesburg CBD - Main Rank
stops.description: Main rank in the CBD. Confirm exact drop point with driver.
stops.recommended_wait_spot: By the taxi lanes at the western entrance
stops.hand_signal: Point toward the road, then thumb over shoulder

hand_signals.name: Default hail
hand_signals.description: Stand facing road, raise arm to shoulder height and wave slowly left-right once; make eye contact with driver.

share_card.title: Soweto → Joburg CBD
share_card.subtitle: Wait at Orlando West Rank • Hand signal: arm out, palm down

stops.name: Sandton Mall Rank
stops.description: Pick-up by the taxi bays behind the mall.
stops.hand_signal: Raise hand above head and wave once

hand_signals.name: Quick hail
hand_signals.description: Lift hand above head and give one clear forward wave; used for faster-moving roads.

share_card.title: Sandton → Alexandra
share_card.subtitle: Sandton Mall taxi bay 3 • Quick hail

stops.name: Adderley St Taxi Rank
stops.description: Central pick-up in CBD next to main bus stops.
stops.recommended_wait_spot: Near the corner by the bookshop
stops.hand_signal: Arm out, palm down, two short waves

stops.name: Khayelitsha Station Rank
stops.description: Main taxi rank near the commuter rail station.
stops.hand_signal: Point down the road, then palm forward

hand_signals.name: Long hail
hand_signals.description: Stand visible, raise arm and wave slowly until driver acknowledges; useful on highways.

share_card.title: Cape Town CBD → Khayelitsha
share_card.subtitle: Adderley St rank • Hand signal: 2 short waves

stops.name: Florence Nightingale Rank
stops.description: Central Durban rank near the beachfront.
stops.recommended_wait_spot: By the taxi lanes near the promenade
stops.hand_signal: Arm up, palm facing forwards, small circular motion

stops.name: Umhlanga Ridge Mall Stop
stops.description: Stop by the shopping centre entrance.
stops.hand_signal: Thumb pointed toward direction of travel

hand_signals.name: Beach hail
hand_signals.description: Raise hand above head and wave once; drivers often slow for visible hails near ranks.

share_card.title: Durban CBD → Umhlanga
share_card.subtitle: Florence Nightingale rank • Hand signal: circular motion

stops.name: Menlyn Mall Taxi Bay
stops.description: Pick-up by the north taxi bay.
stops.hand_signal: Arm raised, palm facing driver, two short waves

stops.name: Church Square Stop
stops.description: Central Pretoria landmark — confirm exact drop point.
stops.hand_signal: Point to the square, then give a thumb

hand_signals.name: Square hail
hand_signals.description: Stand clearly visible, raise arm and show palm; hold until acknowledged.

share_card.title: Menlyn → Pretoria CBD
share_card.subtitle: Menlyn taxi bay A • Hand signal: two short waves

stops.name: Adderley St Rank (CBD)
stops.hand_signal: Raise hand and nod towards road

hand_signals.name: Market hail
hand_signals.description: Make yourself visible and use a steady forward wave; drivers often wait near markets.

stops.name: Randburg Civic Taxi Bay
stops.description: Pick-up next to civic centre parking.
stops.hand_signal: Arm raised, palm facing down, one long wave

stops.name: Roodepoort Mall Stop
stops.description: Stop outside the main mall entrance.
stops.hand_signal: Point down the route and wave once

hand_signals.name: Mall hail
hand_signals.description: Stand visible near the entrance and give a single clear wave toward the road.

share_card.title: Randburg → Roodepoort
share_card.subtitle: Randburg taxi bay • Hand signal: long wave
